/**
 *  ICU <specials> source: <path>/xml/main/fa.xml
 *  Chrome Note: This locale data is abridged to contain categories
 *  actually used by Chrome.
 */
fa{
    AuxExemplarCharacters{"[\u064E-\u0650 \u0652 \u0656 \u0670 ۰-۹ \u200E-\u200F]"}
    ExemplarCharacters{
        "[\u200C \u200D \u064B \u064D \u064C \u0651 \u0654 آ ا ء أ ؤ ئ ب پ ت-ج چ ح-ز ژ س-غ ف ق ک گ "
        "ل-ن و ه ة ی]"
    }
    Languages{
        fa{"فارسی"}
    }
    LocaleScript{
        "Arab",
    }
    Version{"1.115"}
    layout{
        characters{"right-to-left"}
        lines{"top-to-bottom"}
    }
}
